text: "Broken Down in Tiny Pieces" is a song written by John Adrian.https://secondhandsongs.com/work/186327/all It was recorded by country singer Billy "Crash" Craddock, with Janie Fricke performing background vocals on the song. "Broken Down in Tiny Pieces" stayed at number one for one week and spend twelve weeks within the top 40. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !align="left"|Chart (1976–1977) ! style="text- align:center;"|Peak position |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Hot Country Singles | style="text- align:center;"|1 |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks | style="text- align:center;"|2 |} ==Covers== *Billy Joe Royal also recorded a version of the song. ==References== Category:1976 singles Category:Billboard Hot Country Songs number-one singles Category:Billy "Crash" Craddock songs Category:Song recordings produced by Ron Chancey
